2.name: Scout
2.description:
Markers placed on the map will generate radar scans every 2.0s. 
 Reduces range at which enemies can detect the wearer by 30%.

3.name: Fortified
3.description:
Further reduces recoil when crouching or prone by 30%. 
 Provides 50% resistance to explosive damage.

6.name: Engineering Kit
6.description:
Further Reduces recoil when crouching or prone by 30%. 
 Increases initial inventory and holding capacity of grenades by +2.

7.name: Med-Kit
7.description:
Increases initial inventory and holding capacity of stims by +2. 
 Increases stim effect duration by 2.0s.

8.name: Servo-Assisted
8.description:
Increases throwing range by 30%. 
 Provides +50% limb health.

9.name: Democracy Protects
9.description:
50% chance to not die when taking lethal damage. 
 Prevents all damage from bleeding if chest hemorrhages.

10.name: Peak Physique
10.description:
Increased Melee Damage by 50%. 
 Improves weapons handling with less drag on the weapon movement.

11.name: Inflammable
11.description: Provides 75% damage resistance to fire, allowing bearer to rest assured in the inflammability.

12.name: Advanced Filtration
12.description: Provides 80% resistance to gas damage and effects.

13.name: Unflinching
13.description: Helps prevent Helldivers from flinching when hit.
